name: NativeBase Startup+ Design Trial Kit
description:
NativeBase Startup+ Design Trial Kit is a collection of pre-designed screens that can be edited on Figma and used to build your React and React Native applications. You can customise these screens as per your brand’s design system and then use the same to build your web or mobile application using NativeBase Startup+. Learn more

 

What's Included

  • 5 screens to try before you buy. 
  • A gallery of 100+ screens that is included in NativeBase Startup+.
  • Dynamic layers powered by Auto Layout.
  • Responsive designs for different platforms.
  • Available in light and dark mode.


All screens are customisable and available for production-level React and React Native applications. These screens are 100+ responsive, accessible, dark mode compatible. Make use of our Design kit to build your app upto 2x faster.

 

Choose from a gallery of 100+ screens across 15 different categories. Browse Now

To receive the source code with our design files, get the startup+ bundle here


Community

Feedback

If you have any requests or bugs you'd like to report related to this UI Kit, please get in touch with us at Twitter↗ and Discord↗, and we'll try to address them as soon as possible.
